events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department after initial resume screening.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to your application to proceed with next steps.
Your profile matches our requirements well; we would like to schedule an initial screening call with you.
Candidate responded promptly, confirming availability for the initial screening and showing enthusiasm for the role.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess your software engineering skills in detail.
Your technical interview was completed successfully, and the interviewers were impressed by your problem-solving abilities.
We are pleased to extend you a formal job offer for the Software Engineer position at our company.
The candidate has accepted the job offer, expressing excitement to join the engineering team and contribute to projects.
Onboarding process has begun, including setting up accounts, access to development tools, and team introductions.
Hiring process has been completed successfully; the new engineer has joined the team and started work.
